body:
To me this is a great example of the smart room. Very nice series of discussions.

"When an expert network is functioning as its best, the **smartest** person in the room is the room itself." - David Weinberger [#TooBigToKnow](https://twitter.com/hashtag/TooBigToKnow?src=hash)

I personally learned so much and will be more careful about using these terms.
